metadata.title: CVE-2018-12023 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind prior to 2.7.9.4,2.8.11.2, and 2.9.6. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally or fora specific property), the service has the Oracle JDBC jar in the classpath,and an attacker can provide an LDAP service to access, it is possible tomake the service execute a malicious payload.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
